install.name: Multithumb
install.author: Boris Komraz | Until Version 2.0 alpha 3 for Joomla 1.5 Martin Larsen

param.name: @spacer
param.label: <p/ style='margin-top:0'>Popup options
param.description: Options to control the popup style.

param.name: add_headers
param.label: How to add headers for the popup libraries.
param.description:
To use the different popup methods, certain libraries are needed. However, if these are loaded twice the scripts will normally not work.

Multithumb can 'intelligently' decide if the headers are needed by looking in your template file.

If you now that the headers are already present, you can select Never. If you know they are not present, select Always. Otherwise select Automatically.

param.name: popup_type
param.label: Popup method
param.description:
Choose between No popup - just thumbnails, Normal popup, LightBox popup, Slimbox, Greybox or Thumbnail Expansion (expand image without reloading the page).

You can override this setting for individual images by prefixing the alt text (description) with mt_none:, mt_popup:, mt_lightbox:, mt_slimbox:, mt_greybox: or mt_expand:

Remember the colon!

param.name: @spacer
param.label: <p/>Thumbnail options
param.description: Options for changing the style and behaviour of thumbnail.

param.name: enable_thumbs
param.label: Use Thumbnails
param.description: If set to No, thumbnail generation is disabled. Useful is you only want watermarks or resizing the images.

param.name: blog_mode
param.label: Handling of thumbnails in blog mode
param.description: Multithumb can show normal popup images in the introtext in blog mode, or it can create a link to the full article. Or just show the inactive thumbnail.

param.name: thumb_width
param.label: Thumbnail width
param.description: Width of thumbnail in pixel. Set to 0 (zero) to constrain only by height.

param.name: thumb_height
param.label: Thumbnail height
param.description: Height of thumbnail in pixels. Set to 0 (zero) to constrain only by width.

param.name: thumb_proportions
param.label: Thumbnail proportions
param.description: What to do if the original image and resulting thumbnail have different proportions.

param.name: thumb_bg
param.label: Background color of thumbnail
param.description: Background color of thumbnail if Handle proportions is set to fill out.

param.name: border_size
param.label: Border size
param.description: Thumbnail border size in pixels. For other styling of thumbnails, use the field CSS Styling.

param.name: border_color
param.label: Border color
param.description: Thumbnail border color. For other styling of thumbnails, use the field CSS Styling.

param.name: border_style
param.label: Border style
param.description: Thumbnail border style. For other styling of thumbnails, use the field CSS Styling.

param.name: css
param.default:
/*
The comments below are to help you understanding and modifying the look and feel of thumbnails. Borders can be set using the border fields above. You can safely delete these comments.
*/

/*
Styles for the DIV surrounding the image.
*/
div.mtImgBoxStyle {
margin:5px;
}

/*
Styles for the caption box below/above the image.
Change font family and text color etc. here.
*/
div.mtCapStyle {
font-weight: bold;
color: black;
background-color: #ddd;
padding: 2px;
text-align:center;
overflow:hidden;
}
/*
Styles for the table based Multithumb gallery
*/
table.multithumb {
width: auto;
}
param.label: CSS Styling
param.description: CSS styling for the thumbnail image and caption. Change font and text color etc. here. Borders can be set using the border fields above.<p/>To restore the default styles, erase the content of the field and press apply.<p/>You can delete the comments to save some space.

param.name: max_thumbnails
param.label: Max. thumbnails in image sets
param.description: Show only the first x thumbnails in a related lightbox/slimbox/greybox set. Good for slideshows.

param.name: num_cols
param.label: Number of thumbnail columns
param.description: Number of columns in multithumb gallery. Set image description (alt text) to mt_gallery to trigger gallery mode.

param.name: thumbclass
param.label: Give thumbnails this class
param.description: Give the generated thumbnail images this class. Useful for thumbnail styling.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: <p/>Full-size image options
param.description: Options to control the size and appearance of full-sized images, whether in popups or directly in content.

param.name: resize
param.label: Resize images
param.description: If set to Yes the target images (popup etc) will be resized to the values below.

param.name: full_width
param.label: Full-size width in pixels or percent.
param.description: Width of the full image. Can be a percentage of screen width, like 60%. Set to 0 (zero) to constrain by height only (recommended).

param.name: full_height
param.label: Full-size height in pixels or percent.
param.description: Height of the full image. Can be a percentage of screen height, like 60%. Set to 0 (zero) to constrain by width only.

param.name: image_proportions
param.label: Full-size image proportions
param.description: What to do if the original and resized image have different proportions.

param.name: image_bg
param.label: Background color of full-sized image.
param.description: Background color of full-sized image. Applies only if 'Fill out with background color' is selected above.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: <p/>Caption options
param.description: Options for captions

param.name: caption_pos
param.label: Caption position
param.description: A caption text will be shown above or below the image, or disabled.

param.name: caption_type
param.label: Take caption from
param.description: Use Alt or Title attribute for captions. Alt is called 'description' in some editors.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: <p/>Watermark options
param.description: Options for controlling watermarks.

param.name: watermark
param.label: Use watermarks?
param.description: If set to Yes, the watermark from the file below will be added to every fullsize image (not thumbs).

param.name: watermark_file
param.label: Watermark file
param.description: Full path to watermark file.

param.name: watermark_left
param.label: Left position of watermark
param.description: Left position of watermark. Use negative for right position. Leave empty for center.

param.name: watermark_top
param.label: Top position of watermark.
param.description: Top position of watermark. Use negative for bottom position. Leave empty for center.

param.name: transparency_type
param.label: Transparency type
param.description: Choose between True alpha blending (recommended!) or Transparent background color.

param.name: transparent_color
param.label: Transparent color (ignored for true alpha blending)
param.description: Set the (background) color that should be transparent. Ignored for true alpha blending.

param.name: transparency
param.label: Transparency in percent (ignored for true alpha blending)
param.description: Transparency in percent. 0 = watermark invisible, 100 = not transparent (except for the set transparent color!). Ignored for true alpha blending.

param.name: scramble
param.label: Scramble image names?
param.description:
This option can scramble the file names of thumbnails and resized/watermarked images so that users can not guess their real locations. Choose between

No scrambling (Off)

Long file names with no risc of name collision (MD5)

Short file names with little risc of name collision (CRC32)

param.name: @spacer
param.label: <p/>Where to use Multithumb
param.description: Options controlling where to enable Multithumb

param.name: only_cats
param.label: Enable Multithumb in these categories only
param.description: Apply Multithumb to images in these categories only. Seperate categories with semicolon. Leave empty to apply to all categories.

param.name: ignore_cats
param.label: Disable Multithumb in these categories
param.description: Exclude Multithumb in these categories. Seperate categories with semicolon. Leave empty to apply to all categories.

param.name: only_tagged
param.label: Apply only to content with {multithumb}
param.description: Apply only multithumb to content including the {multithumb} tag. Useful if you only need it on a few pages.

param.name: exclude_tagged
param.label: Exclude pages with {nomultithumb}
param.description: Skip pages with {nomultithumb} tag. Useful if you need it on most, but not all pages.

param.name: only_classes
param.label: Apply only to these image CSS classes
param.description: Apply only multithumb to images with these classes. Seperate classes with |. Leave empty to apply to all images.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: <p/>Various options
param.description: Various options

param.name: language
param.label: Language override for Multithumb
param.description: Use the language name, like English, Danish, Polish etc. Leave empty to use the language set in the Global Configuration.

param.name: error_msg
param.label: Show Multithumb error messages
param.description: Select how Multithumb should display error messages

param.name: quality
param.label: JPG quality
param.description:
JPG quality 0-100 for thumbnails and resized/watermarked images. Better quality creates bigger files. Does only apply to JPG!

If you change the quality, you must clear Multithumb's cache to see the changes.

param.name: allow_img_toolbar
param.label: Allow IE Image Toolbar
param.description: If set to yes, Internet Explorer's Image Toolbar will be enabled in the popups. NOTE: IE Only!

param.name: time_limit
param.label: PHP maximum execution limit.
param.description: Sets the maximum execution time for PHP in seconds. If you get a time out error, try with a value like 120 (2 minutes). Leave empty to user the server default value. Does not work in Safe Mode!

param.name: memory_limit
param.label: PHP memory limit.
param.description: Sets the PHP memory limit. Try higher values if you get an Allowed memory size error. Does not work in Safe Mode!
